text: Q.59 Which of the following is/are true about breadth first search of a directed graph. Here, d[i ] denotes depth of vertex i from source S of BFS traversal? e There are no forward edges. e For each tree edge (1, v) d[v] = d[u] + 1. O For each cross edge (1, ) d[v] < d[u] + 1. @ For each back edge (1, v) 0 < d[u] < d[v].
